summary: Completed comprehensive testing of UI/UX Enhancement features. All 15 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend testing verified all features working correctly: Dashboard stat cards navigation, Interview Pipeline status filtering, Delete candidate button, Extended Client Detail fields, and Client user management (edit/delete).
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed bug in create_client endpoint - extended fields (industry, website, phone, address, city, state, country, postal_code, notes) were not being saved to database. Now properly included in client_doc and response.
All dashboard stat cards (Clients, Jobs, Candidates, Interviews) are clickable with cursor-pointer class and navigate correctly
Interview Pipeline cards navigate to /interviews?status={status} with proper URL encoding
Delete candidate button visible on Candidate Detail page for admin users with data-testid='delete-candidate-btn'
Client Detail page displays all extended fields and has Edit/Delete buttons for client users
seed_data_creation: Created test clients with extended fields and test users for client user management testing. All test data prefixed with 'TEST_' for easy cleanup.
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI/UX enhancements fully tested. Dashboard navigation, Interview Pipeline filtering, Candidate deletion, and Client user management all working correctly. Backend bug fixed: create_client now saves extended fields.

backend_api_tests.POST /api/clients (with extended fields): PASS - Creates client with industry, website, phone, address, city, state, country, postal_code, notes
backend_api_tests.PUT /api/clients/{client_id}/users/{emai: PASS - Updates client user name and phone

frontend_tests.Dashboard Stat Cards: PASS - All 4 stat cards (Clients, Jobs, Candidates, Interviews) are clickable with cursor-pointer
frontend_tests.Interview Pipeline Cards: PASS - All 6 pipeline cards (Awaiting, Confirmed, Scheduled, Completed, No Shows, Cancelled) are clickable
frontend_tests.Client Detail Extended Fields: PASS - Shows Industry, Website, Phone, Address fields
frontend_tests.Client Users Section: PASS - Shows Client Users with Edit and Delete buttons
frontend_tests.Candidate Detail Delete Button: PASS - Delete button visible with data-testid='delete-candidate-btn'

bug_fixed.description: create_client endpoint was not saving extended fields (industry, website, phone, address, city, state, country, postal_code, notes)
bug_fixed.fix: Added extended fields to client_doc dictionary and ClientResponse return value in create_client function
